caption.title: Mechanistic illustration of formation and adsorption of polysulfides.
caption.p: a Initial discharge of the S@BPCS composite labeled with practically interpreted polysulfides at different potentials. b In situ Raman spectra of the S@BPCS cell at different potentials. c XPS spectra of the S 2p of S@BPCS cell electrolyte after cycling. d Visual display of adsorption of Na 2S 6 by BPCS and e scheme presenting the volume change during sodiation and desodiation.
